SELECT RN, BOA_NUM, MEM_NAME, CAT_C, CAT_NAME, CAT_NAME_C, CAT_P, BOA_TITLE, BOA_CONTENT, BOA_DATE_REG, BOA_DATE_UP, EVE_NAME, BOA_HIT, BOA_REP_NUM, REP_UP, REP_DOWN, REC_UP, REC_DOWN FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(BOARD PK_BOA_NUM)*/ ROWNUM RN, B.BOA_NUM, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, B.CAT_C, B.CAT_NAME, B.CAT_NAME_C, B.CAT_P, B.BOA_TITLE, B.BOA_CONTENT, B.BOA_DATE_REG, B.BOA_DATE_UP, B.EVE_NAME, B.BOA_HIT, B.BOA_REP_NUM, B.REP_UP, B.REP_DOWN, R.REC_UP, R.REC_DOWN FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID INNER JOIN RECOMMEND R ON B.BOA_NUM = R.BOA_NUM WHERE CAT_P = #{cat_c} AND
ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CAT_P = #{cat_c} AND boa_num > 0
